title: Just had client crash on opening a chest
body: It crashed as I clicked open, I logged back in after and it seems I only got 150 orange essence, I'm not sure if that was my only reward or it bugged out cause of the crash, I have video evidence of the whole thing (shadow play)

replies.body:
Yesterday, I opened a couple of chests and, just as Cyrater said, when I clicked open the game crashed.
Opened another chest right now and the same thing happened. It's really annoying, never had that problem with the old client...

Hey there,

That sounds odd, afaik you cannot unbox JUST essense, especially not an amount that low.

It's possible you may have unboxed a ward skin along with it that was automatically applied to your account, have you obtained a new ward skin at all?

If you don't see anything and are sure there's nothing new in your hextech inventory/ward skins I would recommend [contacting Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) as they will be able to assist you further.
just  checked , no new ward skins
Yeah thanks I contacted play support and they told me, dark star varus icon
